overview: First Episode shows the transformation of an unprepared beautiful innocent teen to become a willing docile lesbian pleasure slave. She is shackled to a bed of sexual depravity and punishment but she must learn complete obedience in order to be freed from her current prison to enter a new life, but where will that be and who will dominate her next.
tagline: Luscious Lesbian Slaves bend to the will of their Sexy Mistress
title: Stories from Slave Life
